analysis.summary: The 'day' field appears to be a date-related field for capturing completion dates, likely requiring day-of-month validation within the September 2025 context.
insights: Field name 'day' with 'date_completion' context strongly indicates a date type field
September 2025 context suggests validation should ensure day values are within 1-30 range
The field likely works in conjunction with month/year fields to form a complete date
Type hint 'date_completion' implies this tracks when something was completed or will be completed
recommendations: Set field type as 'date' with specific day-of-month validation
Implement validation rules: numeric only, range 1-30 for September
Use input format: DD (two-digit day format, e.g., 01, 15, 30)
Assign high priority as date fields are typically critical for document completion
Consider adding calendar picker UI for better user experience
Ensure proper date formatting and validation in conjunction with month/year fields
